title: OCT 2022-Beautiful Packards Corner 1 bed. NO FEE, H/HW Inc.
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 228501609', 'Rent: $2,200 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 10/02/2022', 'OCT 2022-Beautiful Packards Corner 1 bed.', 'H/HW Inc.', 'Comprising the first block of residences on Brighton Avenue, the Brighton Avenue Apartments enjoy prime access to Allston’s Packard’s corner neighborhood at the intersection of Allston, Boston, and Brookline.', 'A host of city conveniences lie less than one block from your front door and include MBTA Green Line (B) access, both the Star and Super 88 Supermarkets, the Commonwealth Sports Club and a plethora of shops and restaurants.', 'Heat and hot water are included', 'Laundry on site', 'Pet Friendly for Additional Fee', 'PLEASE RESPOND WITH YOUR ACTUAL EMAIL ADDRESS OR PHONE NUMBER TO ENSURE YOU RECEIVE MY RESPONSE!', 'THANK YOU!', 'Call Aidan at 201-449-4090 or respond with your name, phone number, and email for further information or to schedule a showing!', 'Aidan Pink', 'Real Estate Agent', 'East Coast Realty']
